definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
proportion of those present and voting
pinyin: chu1 xi2 biao3 jue2 bi3 li4

sentences.english: The only difference is that government's shares would be nonvoting until the government sold the shares at a later date.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的區別就在於政府在出售股票之前不具有表決權。

sentences.english: Several members , refusing to accept the decision of the vote , got up and stormed out .
sentences.chinese: 幾個成員拒絕接受表決的結果，憤然而起，猛衝出去。

sentences.english: The union has balloted its members in pursuit of a pay claim.
sentences.chinese: 爲了要求加薪，工會讓其成員進行無記名投票表決。

sentences.english: The measure is advancing toward a final vote late Thursday, Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 這項議案將於聖誕節的除夕夜星期四表決。

sentences.english: The new Organic Act of eROC Military Law has been approved by eROC Congress.
sentences.chinese: 新國防部暨國軍組織法已通過議會表決。

sentences.english: Representatives of six nations walked out to show their opposition to the vote.
sentences.chinese: 六個國家的代表退出以示反對投票表決。

sentences.english: Model workers were chosen by a show of hands.
sentences.chinese: 舉手表決選出勞動模範。

sentences.english: The radicals had failed by one vote. When the Senate voted on the other charges, the result was the same.
sentences.chinese: 當表決其他項指控時，結果都是一樣的。

sentences.english: They chose their monitor by a show of hands.
sentences.chinese: 他們舉手表決選出了班長。
好的，很好的舉手表決方法。

sentences.english: Consultative parties and associated organisations shall have the right to speak but not to vote.
sentences.chinese: 各諮議黨與合作組織有發言權，但不參與投票表決。

sentences.english: The decisions of an Ordinary General Assembly are taken by a simple majority of the members present.
sentences.chinese: 常規全體大會的決議由出席會員表決。

sentences.english: Moreover, it does so in what could be interpreted by many to be a legally-binding popular vote.
sentences.chinese: 而且，很多人可能將此視爲具有法律效力的全民表決。

sentences.english: We shall take a voice vote on this problem.
sentences.chinese: 我們將口頭對這一問題做個表決。

sentences.english: A motion was made, seconded and passed to accept the resignation of Mr. Smith.
sentences.chinese: 接受史密施先生辭職的提議，經附議表決後通過。

definition: to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation
